pengu.messenger

Class PenguRESTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguRESTClient

  • public class PenguRESTClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used when wanting to communicate with any Pengu API server That uses a REST architectural style.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PenguRESTClient

        public PenguRESTClient(java.lang.String APIServerAddressAndProtocol,
                       java.lang.String mainDirectory,
                       java.lang.String endpoint)
        Parameterized constructor method that receives the API server's: address, access protocol, main directory, and endpoint.
        Parameters:
        APIServerAddressAndProtocol - The API server's address and access protocol (HTTP/HTTPS).
        mainDirectory - The API server's main directory.
        endpoint - The API server's endpoint.

      • makeRequestForData

        public java.lang.String makeRequestForData(java.lang.String[][] parameters)
                                    throws PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException,
                                           PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException
        Makes a request for data from the API server, using the previously set values for the API server's: address, access protocol, main directory, and endpoint.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The POST parameters to send to the server. Format: {{"parameter1", "value1"},{"parameter2},{"value2}, ...}
        Returns:
        Returns the response text form the server.
        Throws:
        PenguRESTClient.ServerErrorException
        PenguRESTClient.BadRequestException
        PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException
        PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
        PenguRESTClient.NotFoundException
        PenguRESTClient.ServiceDownException
        PenguRESTClient.BadConnectionException
